kafka.etl.impl

类 SimpleKafkaETLJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • kafka.etl.impl.SimpleKafkaETLJob

  • public class SimpleKafkaETLJob
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a simple Kafka ETL job which pull text events generated by DataGenerator and store them in hdfs
